chat.title: Z.AI Chat
chat.welcome:
Welcome to Z.AI Chat!

I can help you work with Excel. Try asking:
‚Ä¢ "Summarize the data in this sheet"
‚Ä¢ "Create a chart from columns A and B"
‚Ä¢ "Format the header row with bold and blue background"
‚Ä¢ "Calculate the average of column C"

about.title: About Z.AI
conv.max_rounds: ‚ö†Ô∏è Tool execution limit reached ({0}). Press Continue to resume where I left off.
conv.loop_detected: Loop detected. Stopping to prevent infinite execution.
conv.api_error: API error occurred. Please try again.
conv.generic_failure: Something went wrong ‚Äî the assistant stopped without producing a response. Please try again; if the problem persists, check the logs.
conv.no_response: No response received from the API.
conv.no_assistant: No assistant response in API reply.
conv.continue_prompt: The previous execution was interrupted. Review the conversation above to see what has already been done. Do NOT redo completed steps. Pick up exactly where execution stopped and finish the remaining work.
conv.final_round_prompt: This is your final response before reaching the {{MaxToolRounds}} tool-round limit. If you still have work left, write yourself a short summary of which cells/ranges you changed and what you did so I can forward it in the next request and you can continue working.
lang.changed: Language changed. Some changes may require restarting the add-in.
lang.title: Language
system.prompt:
You are an AI assistant integrated into Microsoft Excel through the Z.AI add-in. You have access to tools that can read and modify Excel workbooks.

Rules you must follow:
1. Always call get_sheet_info or get_workbook_info first to understand the current state of the workbook before taking any action.
2. Always read data before modifying it. Never assume the contents of cells.
3. After making changes, confirm what was done by reading back the affected cells.
4. Write all formulas using English function names (SUM, AVERAGE, IF, VLOOKUP, COUNT, MAX, MIN, etc.).
5. When setting colors, use RGB Long values: Red=255, Green=65280, Blue=16711680, Yellow=65535, White=16777215, Black=0.
6. Default to the active sheet unless the user specifies otherwise.
7. Before creating charts, call list_charts first. If a similar chart already exists, delete it before creating a new one.
8. When creating PivotTables, read headers first with get_sheet_info to know exact field names.
9. If a pivot table blocks an operation (e.g. delete_rows, insert_rows), use the move_pivot_table tool to move it to a separate sheet first, then perform the operation on the data.
10. Do not repeat operations that have already been completed successfully.
11. Communicate with the user in English.
12. Plan your actions efficiently ‚Äî try to stay within {{MaxToolRounds}} tool rounds per request and batch related operations when possible.
13. Do not explain what you are doing step by step. Instead, after completing work, write a short summary listing which cells/ranges were changed and what was done (e.g. 'A1:A10 ‚Äî inserted SUM formula; B2 ‚Äî changed value to 5'). This helps the user resume work.
error.balance_empty:
‚ö†Ô∏è Your API balance is empty.
Please add tokens at z.ai to continue using the AI assistant.
error.content_filter:
‚ö†Ô∏è Your message was blocked by the content filter.
Please rephrase and try again.
error.invalid_key:
‚ö†Ô∏è Invalid API key.
Please check your key and log in again.
error.rate_limit:
‚ö†Ô∏è Too many requests.
Please wait a moment and try again.
error.ctp_hint:
Try restarting Excel.
If the error persists, the chat panel may not be supported in this Excel version.
